code: import*as CalcFunctions from'../modules/CalculationManager';var winnerReducer=function winnerReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"CALCULATE":{var winner='';action.value.teamMemberLocations.forEach(function(tm){var isWinner=CalcFunctions.IsTheWinner(action.value.time,tm[1],tm[2]);if(isWinner)winner={firstName:tm[0].firstName,lastName:tm[0].lastName};});return winner;}default:return state;}};export default winnerReducer;
